name: scripts-sync
description: Cloud-synced script manager - edit on one terminal, available everywhere

scripts.build: bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/scripts-sync && bun build src/cli/postinstall.ts --compile --outfile dist/postinstall
scripts.worker:db:init: cd worker && wrangler d1 execute scripts-sync-db --local --file=src/db/schema.sql
